title: Taxi Services for Pune Mumbai Tourism
text:
Taxi Services for Pune Mumbai Tourism Taxi Services for Pune Mumbai Tourism 0 
In recent studies it has been found that Mumbai-Pune route is among some of the busiest routes in the country with regards to tourist ingress. Due to this reason there are several Pune Mumbai taxi services available nowadays to select from which are trying to cater to this growing demand fueled by tourism in the region. 
Positive aspects of these cab services 
Some of the main aspects of these Pune Mumbai cabs which are drawing attention of vacation travelers towards them are: 
a) Comfortable taxis with most of the modern facilities as well as 24/7 availability. 
b) Quick pickups ensured by utilization of latest technology such as the GPS system. 
c) Right fares guaranteed by printed receipts as well as digital meters. 
d) Taxi drivers who have undergone police verification to ensure safety for tourists. 
e) Professional drivers who are fully conversant in local languages as well as in English and Hindi. 
f) Availability of different cabs to choose from depending upon individual preferences such as deluxe, luxury and budget cabs. 
g) Assurance of tourist safety due to presence of GPS tracking to ensure that the taxi is going on preset route only. 
Security for Tourists 
Due to the recent incidences there has been growing concern over security of tourists in Pune Mumbai cabs. Taxi operators are seriously looking into these issues many features have already been implemented to make things safer for tourists. Let us look at some of them here. 
Safety Alerts and Monitoring: In several of these taxis, operators have added safety alert switches for tourist's right at the back of the taxi so that they can easily access them if required. Additionally, most of the operators have also set up 24 hour control rooms to constantly monitor operations as well as prevent rash driving. 
Geo Fencing: Pune Mumbai taxi service providers are using latest technology to implement what is known as geo fencing which is used to alert the control room if any deviation takes place from the preset route. 
In case of deviation the driver is called and if the person does not respond then the tourist traveling in the cab is called. If the response from tourists sounds suspicious then police is immediately informed to act upon the situation. 
Distress Buttons: Many of the operators are planning use of distress buttons which tourists will be able to access quite easily. In case of any problem they would be able to use it for calling emergency assistance. 
Gender Based Facility: Operators also have plans of implementing feature where in case the tourist is a female tourist then the control room would be calling the person several times during the journey to ensure everything is alright and there are no safety concerns. 
Mobile Apps: There are various apps in development stage for ensuring safety of tourists. One such app will allow tourists to share all taxi details on social platforms like Facebook and WhatsApp as well as send them through SMS or Email to their friends. If you are planning a trip from Pune to Mumbai then Divya Cabs is the best operator in the region to choose due to the excellent service they provide. You can also be sure about safety during your travel and relax while taking the ride. Rate this Article
